items.text: good length outside off, firmly driven down the ground, but straight to mid off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, driven square off the front foot to the man in the deep. Only a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, angling into the batsman, clipped off his hips to deep backward square
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: dropped at first slip! Good length wide outside off, tries to cut at it with hard hands, takes the top edge through to Nasir Hossain at wide first slip, drops a simple catch. Smiles all around, though, given Bangladesh's dominance all morning. Rubel gives out a smile too. Was a regulation chance
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, 1 run

items.text: goes short to end the over, pitched outside off and soars over the batsman's head. No shot offered
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven off the front foot to short cover, diving effort from the fielder stops the single
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Waller, 1 run

items.text: tossed up from as wide as possible, drifts and lands on middle, tapped back to the bowler off the front foot. Tight
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, Raza's cramped for room, fended back to Sunzamul
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, tapped to short cover
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: uses his feet this time, full outside off, and driven between cover and mid off. Work for the men at wide long off and deep extra cover
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up full outside off, opens the bat's face and carves it to cover point
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: stays low! Back of a length outside off, tries to cut given where the ball pitched, but the ball stays very slow. Through to the keeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, jags back into the batsman's pads, worked off his pads to square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, movement in the air, walks across to the off side and punched firmly to mid off off the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, angles into him as he tries to cut, too close to his body to play the shot, and it takes the top edge. Safely through to third man this time
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: almost a yorker on off stump, low full toss eventually. Struck firmly to mid off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, no run

items.text: good length outside off, movement in the air, cut off the back foot to cover point. Well stopped by the fielder followed up by a sharp throw at the non striker's. Raza was always in, though
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, cramps Raza on this occasion. Hits the inside of his boot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: overpitched on off stump, dug away square to the off side. Man in the deep
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: straightens from middle after pitching, full ball and defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Waller, no run

items.text: beaten! Full on off stump, grip and turn away from the batsman's attempted drive. Flies just past his outside edge and barely over the top of off stump
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Waller, no run

items.text: full on middle, driven off the front foot to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Waller, 1 run

items.text: low full toss on middle and leg, mistimed towards midwicket, beats the infielder, thereby allowing them to take the run
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.text: short outside off, attacking the batsman's body as it angles sharply in, does well to sway away from the line of the delivery while dropping his knees
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, pokes at it towards cover, takes off for a quick run. Completed with ease
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Waller, 1 run
